nodes.text: A Rodian Platter was a dish available on the menu at the BanthaQuik! food stop in the city of Lumchugger's Hub on the planet Bescane. It consisted of deeply oiled cranker roots.
The Rodian platter first appeared in Death-Hunter a Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game adventure included in the ninth instalment of the Star Wars Adventure Journal series by West End Games.
